title: Astro Preview Executor
description: Start the Astro preview server to test the production build locally

port.description: Port number where the preview server will serve the built site

x-prompt.message: Which port should the preview server use?

host.description: Hostname or IP address to bind the preview server to

open.description: Automatically open the preview site in your default browser after starting

config.description: Path to Astro configuration file (relative to project root)
config.x-prompt: Path to Astro config file (leave empty for default):

verbose.description: Enable detailed logging for debugging preview server issues
